import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers/index";import{persistStore,persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var persistConfig={key:"authType",storage:storage,whitelist:["user"]// which reducer want to store
};var pReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);var store=createStore(pReducer,applyMiddleware(thunk));var persistor=persistStore(store);export{persistor,store};
